objects.specification: A smooth concrete floor with a polished finish in a subtle light gray tone, providing a durable and clean base that complements the natural theme of the classroom.
A structural wall painted in a soft beige tone with a smooth matte finish, evoking natural sandstone textures appropriate for a dinosaur-themed environment.
A structural wall painted in a soft beige tone with a smooth matte finish, matching the front wall to maintain consistent natural tones throughout the room.
A side wall finished in a natural light brown hue with a matte texture, providing a neutral backdrop for dinosaur decor and shelving.
A side wall finished in a natural light brown hue with a matte texture, serving as the display area for posters and additional dinosaur-themed elements.

A larger teacher's desk crafted from polished dark wood with a broad rectangular top and subtle decorative edging, featuring sturdy legs and an integrated modesty panel for a professional and natural appearance.
A comfortable ergonomic teacher's chair upholstered in deep green fabric with a cushioned seat and backrest, supported by a swivel base with caster wheels and adjustable height mechanism.
A tall wooden bookshelf in dark brown finish with multiple evenly spaced shelves filled with dinosaur-related books and teaching materials, offering a sturdy and thematic display.
A small 3D dinosaur model with realistic textured skin in earthy green and brown hues, posed dynamically to suggest movement, featuring detailed scales and anatomical contours.
A small 3D dinosaur model with realistic textured skin in earthy green and brown hues, posed dynamically to suggest movement, featuring detailed scales and anatomical contours.
A large matte blackboard featuring a dark writing surface framed by a slim wooden border, designed for educational use with clear visibility and a smooth chalk-friendly finish.
A vibrant wall poster depicting a variety of dinosaur species in a watercolor illustration style, rich in natural greens and browns, capturing educational and decorative appeal.
A round wall clock with a simple white face, bold black numerals, slender black hands, and a thin metal frame, offering clear time display and subtle design.
A leafy green potted plant with broad foliage arranged in a simple terracotta pot, evoking prehistoric vegetation and adding a natural accent to the classroom.
A leafy green potted plant with broad foliage arranged in a simple terracotta pot, evoking prehistoric vegetation and adding a natural accent to the classroom.
A leafy green potted plant with broad foliage arranged in a simple terracotta pot, evoking prehistoric vegetation and adding a natural accent to the classroom.
A medium-sized 3D dinosaur model with textured scaly skin in muted green and brown tones, posed in a dynamic stance with lifelike anatomical details.
A medium-sized 3D dinosaur model with textured scaly skin in muted green and brown tones, posed in a dynamic stance with lifelike anatomical details.
A medium-sized 3D dinosaur model with textured scaly skin in muted green and brown tones, posed in a dynamic stance with lifelike anatomical details.
A small dinosaur fossil replica cast in a stone-like off-white material with realistic embedded bone textures, perfect for display on the teacher's desk.
A sturdy student desk with an earthy brown wooden top and subtle green trim, featuring a rectangular surface and four slender legs with anti-scratch coating.
A matching student chair with a wooden frame, green padded seat and backrest, and four straight legs, designed for durability and comfort.
